mapper.select: select * from room r where id=#{roomId}
select * from room r where type=#{roomType}
select * from room r where status=#{roomStatus}
select * from room r where floor=#{floor}

select * from room r
or r.standardPrice=#{roomPrice} or r.vipPrice=#{roomPrice} or r.memberPrice=#{roomPrice} or r.discountPrice=#{roomPrice}
